languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс непроизвольно отшатывается назад, а затем морщится и касается виска, словно от головной боли.{/n} "Это плохо. Это очень, очень плохо... Оружие наизготовку, {name}".
{n}Heinrix recoils, then grimaces and touches his temple as if pained by a headache.{/n} "This is bad. This is very, very bad... Ready your weapon, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс непроизвольно отшатывается назад, а затем морщится и касается виска, словно от головной боли.{/n} "Это плохо. Это очень, очень плохо... Оружие наизготовку, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix recoils involuntarily, then grimaces and touches his temple as if pained by a headache.{/n} "This is bad. This is very, very bad... Ready your weapon, {name}."
{n}Heinrix recoils involuntarily, then grimaces and touches his temple as if pained by a headache.{/n} "This is bad. This is very, very bad... Ready your weapon, {name}."
{n}Heinrix recoils, then grimaces and touches his temple as if pained by a headache.{/n} "This is bad. This is very, very bad... Ready your weapon, {name}."
{n}Heinrix recoils, then grimaces and touches his temple as if pained by a headache.{/n} "This is bad. This is very, very bad... Ready your weapon, {name}."
{n}Heinrix recoils, then grimaces and touches his temple as if pained by a headache.{/n} "This is bad. This is very, very bad... Ready your weapon, {name}."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix recula, hace una mueca y se lleva la mano a la sien como si le doliera la cabeza.{/n} «Esto es malo. Muy, pero que muy malo. Prepare sus armas, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix recoils, then grimaces and touches his temple as if pained by a headache.{/n} "This is bad. This is very, very bad... Ready your weapon, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix recula, hace una mueca y se lleva la mano a la sien como si le doliera la cabeza.{/n} «Esto es malo. Muy, pero que muy malo. Prepare sus armas, {name}».

languages.text: {n}海因里希吃了一惊，之后露出痛苦的表情揉着太阳穴，仿佛头开始疼起来了一样。{/n}“这很糟糕。这真是太糟糕，太糟糕了……掏出武器，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix recoils, then grimaces and touches his temple as if pained by a headache.{/n} "This is bad. This is very, very bad... Ready your weapon, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希吃了一惊，之后露出痛苦的表情揉着太阳穴，仿佛头开始疼起来了一样。{/n}“这很糟糕。这真是太糟糕，太糟糕了……掏出武器，{name}。”

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは後退りして、顔をしかめ、頭痛に苦しむかのようにこめかみに触れる。{/n}「まずいぞ。とてつもなくまずい…武器を抜く準備をしろ、{name}」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix recoils, then grimaces and touches his temple as if pained by a headache.{/n} "This is bad. This is very, very bad... Ready your weapon, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは後退りして、顔をしかめ、頭痛に苦しむかのようにこめかみに触れる。{/n}「まずいぞ。とてつもなくまずい…武器を抜く準備をしろ、{name}」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix weicht zurück, zieht eine Grimasse und berührt seine Schläfe, als würden ihn Kopfschmerzen plagen.{/n} "Das ist schlecht. Das ist richtig, richtig schlecht ... Macht Eure Waffe bereit, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix recoils, then grimaces and touches his temple as if pained by a headache.{/n} "This is bad. This is very, very bad... Ready your weapon, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix weicht zurück, zieht eine Grimasse und berührt seine Schläfe, als würden ihn Kopfschmerzen plagen.{/n} "Das ist schlecht. Das ist richtig, richtig schlecht ... Macht Eure Waffe bereit, {name}."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix fait un mouvement de recul. Il grimace et touche sa tempe comme s'il avait mal à la tête.{/n} « C'est mauvais signe. Très mauvais signe... Sortez votre arme, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix recoils, then grimaces and touches his temple as if pained by a headache.{/n} "This is bad. This is very, very bad... Ready your weapon, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix fait un mouvement de recul. Il grimace et touche sa tempe comme s'il avait mal à la tête.{/n} « C'est mauvais signe. Très mauvais signe... Sortez votre arme, {name}. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix irkilip yüzünü ekşitiyor, ani bir ağrı girmişçesine elini şakaklarına götürüyor.{/n} "Bu hiç hayra alamet değil. Hem de hiç... {name}, silahını hazırda bulundur."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix recoils, then grimaces and touches his temple as if pained by a headache.{/n} "This is bad. This is very, very bad... Ready your weapon, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix irkilip yüzünü ekşitiyor, ani bir ağrı girmişçesine elini şakaklarına götürüyor.{/n} "Bu hiç hayra alamet değil. Hem de hiç… {name}, silahını hazırda bulundur."
